name: The Reaper Coin
description: What is the project about? The character Reaper was inspired by the famous Grim Reaper crypto meme and the well-known cartoon called Billy and Mandy. Reaper is fed up with all the meme scams/rug pulls/pump&dumps going on and is on a mission to wipe out their liquidity and become the biggest meme so far. What makes your project unique? Very unique meme, amazing degen artists, top influencers onboard and well connected/active team. History of your project. We have worked on the idea of launching reaper for about 3 months after we saw some Reaper memes online and the idea was originated from that. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We are planning to launch NFTs What can your token be used for? It's a meme token for now but soon it will be used for NFTs.
